name: BipolarDisorder
title: Bipolar Disorder
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for diagnoses related to bipolar disorder.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent all relevant diagnoses associated with bipolar disorder.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
